articles.author: Josh Bavas, Claudia Jambor
articles.title: Family's loss of life claim for White Island volcano victim rejected by insurer for American Express on technicality - ABC News
articles.description: Jason Griffiths was walking back to the tour boat when he was fatally injured in the White Island volcano eruption. But because he wasn't already on the boat, insurer Chubb is rejecting his family's loss of life claim.
